pullrequest.title: Mass tweak in torsional friction tutorial

content.raw:
With 10,000 kg it moves a bit and stops earlier than if it is lighter. The idea was to make the results of friction very clear. But even with 1000 kg it is stopping in a couple of seconds, so I'm fine with changing it.

One thing I noticed though is that now when we return from the model editor the simulation is always paused. If you apply force with the simulation paused nothing happens. It might be worth it adding a note to make sure the simulation is not paused.
content.html:
With 10,000 kg it moves a bit and stops earlier than if it is lighter. The idea was to make the results of friction very clear. But even with 1000 kg it is stopping in a couple of seconds, so I'm fine with changing it.

One thing I noticed though is that now when we return from the model editor the simulation is always paused. If you apply force with the simulation paused nothing happens. It might be worth it adding a note to make sure the simulation is not paused.
